subject: Issue with order #SSN4704
description_text:
Hello team,

I ordered Simsonn pedals on Dec 11,2025 (order number #SSN4704) I have paid
for express shipping(3 -7 days)

I have got my tracking number with UPS (*1ZJ455510419854895*)

Ideally I should have got my order before December 18,2025. That’s what I
paid extra £30 for (express 3-7 day delivery)

I have tried contacting simsonn support multiple occasions reguarding this
issue and they just ignore the part where I have paid extra and what are
they gonna do about it.

I understand there might be unforeseen circumstances for the delay but
that’s not what I paid for right..? If I am going to receive my order after
2 weeks of placement then I have paid £30 for nothing. I could have gone
with the normal delivery option without paying a dime.

And please don’t apologise either. That’s not gonna compensate the extra
amount I have paid.
Kindly provide me a refund for the delivery charges.


PFA the needed screenshots

conversations.body_text: Hi NIJOHN JM,    We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused. This shipping channel is currently at full capacity, so we will arrange an urgent UPS shipment for you. Delivery is expected on the 21rd.

Hello team,

Thanks for the update, it would be great if you can share the tracking link
or something so that I don’t have to email every single time for an update.

I understand the problem, but what is the point of me paying extra for
shipping then…? I could have just paid the normal shipping cost right if it
will take 10 days to deliver.

I would request to provide the compensation for delivery fee £23 is not a
small amount if I add another £20 or so I could have purchased the rumble
motor.
So kindly provide a refund for the shipping cost or some equivalent coupon
or compensation

Regards
Nijohn
